item.title: Making a Connect Four AI
item.description: DISCLAIMER Things in this article may be incorrect, and I do not know a lot about this topic. If there are any mistakes, please do not hesitate to correct me. Introduction I was tasked with creating a 2D array game for my computer science course, and I went with Tic Tac Toe. Soon after, I wrote an AI for it using the minimax algorithm. I wrote it in Python because it was quick to put together.
